q: commercial. Jaime Bayly and Collins stand up and kiss on the cheek, but their microphones remain on. "Don't come here just to complain about my behavior," Jaime Bayly says angrily over the outro music. And don't be so damn boring. Jaime Bayly is a man of many parts. He's both David Letterman and Charlie Rose ; comedian and serious interviewer; straight and gay; shamelessly self-promoting and relentlessly self-deprecating. After a one-and-a-half-year hiatus, he

- SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate." Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

I would argue that implanting something in your brain is beyond the creepy line- at least for the moment, until the technology gets better onstage during a product demo, and you're a PR nightmare.
